# Example

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var foo = require( 'foo' );
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="examples">

## Examples

```javascript
var foo = require( 'foo' );
// Example
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->

### Usage

```c
#include "foo.h"
```

<section class="examples">

### Examples

```c
// C example
#include "foo.h"

int main() {
    foo();
    return 0;
}
```

</section>
